Header: Appeal Court rejects Wele Suda’s appeal over death sentence
Content: The appeal filed by drug dealer ‘Vele Suda’ against the death sentence which was issued on him by the Colombo High Court has been rejected by the Appeal Court. G.V. Samantha Kumara alias ‘Wele Suda’ is serving a death sentence after he was convicted over the possession of just over seven grams of heroin in 2015. He was arrested in Mount Lavinia in 2008 and sentenced to death by the Colombo High Court in the year 2015.
